mapper.select: SELECT c.idColaborador, c.nombre, c.apellidoPaterno, c.apellidoMaterno, c.curp, c.correo, c.noPersonal, c.noLicencia, c.status, c.idRol, r.rol AS nombreRol, c.idSucursal, s.nombre AS nombreSucursal FROM PacketWorld.colaborador c INNER JOIN PacketWorld.rol r ON c.idRol = r.idRol INNER JOIN PacketWorld.sucursal s ON c.idSucursal = s.idSucursal WHERE c.status = 1;
